parameter.name: mean_method
parameter.title: Averaging Method
parameter.description: The type of average used to form each sample group.

parameter.name: sample1_range
parameter.title: Initial Samples(s)
parameter.description: A group of Experiments, specified by a range and/or list of columns.

parameter.name: sample2_range
parameter.title: Final Samples(s)
parameter.description: A group of Experiments, specified by a range and/or list of columns.
